name: Soccer Messenger Game - A Social Network Goal Kick
name_original: Soccer Messenger Game - A Social Network Goal Kick
description:
The latest football/soccer social network social media game has now arrived! Here it is!

- Kick (Tap) ball to score
- Game runs on all iPhones, iPod Touches and iPads running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- No IAPs, no micro transactions, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements.
-Please buy the full pro version to support me. Thanks. :)
-If you end up liking it, please gift it to your friends and family, or get the PRO versions.

Enjoy!
